title: Why doesn’t Google Flights have a dedicated app? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is there a google flights contact? Have you used this previously? Did you look at travel sites? In a world now becoming more and more willing and doing pushing buttons become aware that Your actions allow snooping into your life. Don't leave any tracks that you will be away AND do tell important persons your detailed location and approximately’ the planned” timings. Moore to tell about safeguarding what you are leaving & about traveling Moore safely. Protect Yourself and beloved/s and don't invite apps/snoops in!

As far as I know from 10th April 2018 google retiring the QPX Express API and shutting down. That’s why probably no app for google flights. For more information https://developers.google.com/qpx-express/
